page.title: 09GREYSTONE,LYNE OF SKENE.
page.content: {Greystone}is a house in our area for sale,ideally for anyone who owns {horses.}This modern bungalow is situated only 12 miles from Aberdeen in the midst of rural splendour. The{bungalow}is set in about 7 acres of ground with mature garden,five paddocks,modern stable block of three loose boxes and tack room,substantial undeveloped cottar house and large double garage. The main house comprises:lounge,luxury dining kitchen,four bedrooms,bathroom and w.c.Also the house has oil central heating and double glazing. Offers are requested for over{Â£95,000} and the Rateable value stands at Â£357.
